recent_news: Governance Innovation Labs focuses on public policy and governance innovation — relevant to AI regulation and institutional transparency
Asha's Head of Public Policy role positions her as connected to government, regulatory bodies, and institutional decision-makers globally
enrichment_data.outreach_angle: Asha leads public policy at a governance innovation organization — directly relevant to the Global Foundation for Transparent Collective Gatherings (governance/transparency nonprofit) and ATX (AI-mediated trust and collaboration). She could be an early adopter/advisor for the Foundation, or help navigate regulatory considerations for ATX in Singapore (a key market). Reach out this quarter: 'Asha — I have been developing the Global Foundation for Transparent Collective Gatherings, a governance institution for large events and collective decision-making. Your expertise in public policy and governance innovation would be incredibly valuable as we design the policy framework. Would you be open to a 30-minute advisory conversation?'
